name: Picky Eater (Juliette)
description:
a micro-game where you feed a cat (the first game I fully coded by myself)

Controls:  click on start and use the left and right arrows (or A and D) to move left and right.

Credits:  illustration, design and code by Juliette Coquet
sfx: mixkit.co
very annoying music: playonloop.com

and also I would like to thanks my friend Marco for his help when I was stuck and seeing everything in black because wow wow coding is not easy.
